description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for the interface 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' used in testing. It uses Google Mock macros to create mock methods corresponding to the interface's functions, facilitating unit testing by allowing behavior simulation.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign identifying the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix associated with the service.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns configuration line information.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data directory path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a certain feature or capability is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns the subsystem interface pointer.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with an identifier and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with key-value information.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries for an interface based on callsign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification client.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification client.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model identifier.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if service runs in background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns some accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path to proxy/stub.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns the hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs string substitution.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason for state changes.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with provided string.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns the system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns the system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns the plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets the start mode.

methods.name: Resumed (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets the resumed state.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a reason.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Retrieves library search paths.
